Subclasses of Region in gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Region
 class AnnularRegion
          The AnnularRegion is used to pass points selected between two circle regions (a ring) (in SelectionOverlay) from the view component to the viewer.
 class BoxRegion
          This class is a specific region designated by two points.
 class DoubleWedgeRegion
          This class is a specific region designated by three points.

 class PointRegion
          This class passes one or more selected points.
 class TableRegion

 class WedgeRegion
          This class is a specific region designated by three points.
